gov.nih.nlm.mrd.server
Class FullMRFilesReleaseGenerator

java.lang.Object
  gov.nih.nlm.mrd.server.ReleaseGenerator
      gov.nih.nlm.mrd.server.FullMRFilesReleaseGenerator
All Implemented Interfaces:
MEMEApplicationService
public class FullMRFilesReleaseGenerator
extends ReleaseGenerator

Handles requests for building a Full set of RRF MR files.

Author:
MEME Group
